name: Sweet and Tangy Summer Macaroni Salad
author: tojo5
summary: Quick and easy. Tastes best when it sits for a while before serving. I change up the veggies every time I make it, with whatever I have on hand. Carrots and celery work well.
ingredients: ½  green bell pepper, seeded and chopped
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook elbow macaroni in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, 8 minutes
Drain and rinse in cold water until macaroni is cooled
Place macaroni into a large salad bowl and stir in tomatoes, green bell pepper, cucumber, and green onion
Whisk sugar, vegetable oil, ketchup, vinegar, salt, paprika, and black pepper, stirring in a bowl until sugar has dissolved
Pour dressing over macaroni and vegetables and toss to coat
